Plot: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.
Title: Grudge Match
Writer: Tim Kelleher (screenplay), Rodney Rothman (screenplay), Tim Kelleher (story)
Actors: Jim Lampley, Sylvester Stallone, Robert De Niro, Rich Little
tomatoConsensus: Grudge Match is sporadically funny but meandering, and its strong cast largely mired in a plot that's overrun with clichés.
